England and East-India inconsistent in their manufactures being an answer to a treatise intituled, An essay on the East-India trade by the author of, The essay of wayes and means. Pollexfen, John, b. ca. 1638.
59, [1] p.
[s.n.], London : 1697.
Attributed by Wing to John Pollexfen. Cf. also DNB. Advertisement: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
=======
